description: Oversee daily restaurant operations at Harbor Bistro, ensuring high standards of service, efficient back-of-house coordination, and profitable business performance.
responsibilities: Manage front and back of house teams; recruit, train and coach staff; oversee stock, inventory and supplier relationships; handle scheduling and wage costs; ensure compliance with food safety and hygiene standards; manage guest experience and handle escalations; analyse P&L and work on revenue growth initiatives.
skills_technical: Basic HR and labour law awareness
